articles.author: Clare Duffy
articles.title: Apple fixing bug that caused dictation feature to type the word ‘Trump’ when users said ‘racist’ - CNN
articles.description: Apple says it’s fixing a technical bug that caused its voice-to-text system to briefly replace the word “racist” with the word “Trump.”
articles.content:
Apple says its fixing a technical bug that caused its voice-to-text system to briefly replace the word racist with the word Trump.
Some iPhone users had reported on Tuesday that when they spoke the … [+1997 chars]
